statement:
Let $L$ be a first order language, let $\mathcal{A}$ be an $L$-structure
and let $K\subseteq\operatorname{dom}(\mathcal{A})$. Then there is an
$L$-structure $\mathcal{B}$ such that $K\subseteq\mathcal{B}$ and
$|\mathcal{B}|\leq\operatorname{Max}(|K|,|L|)$ and $\mathcal{B}$ is
elementarily embedded in $\mathcal{A}$.
